body.name: GARMOLY Moon Incense Burner with 60 Incense Cones + 30 Incense Stick, Ceramic Waterfall Incense Burner, Backflow Incense Holder for Aromatherapy Ornament Home Decor (Cyan)

features: ☽ Well-designed: Our incense burner holder is meticulously handcrafted using high-quality ceramic, featuring a unique combination of a moon and lotus leaf shape. When you light the incense cones, it creates a captivating visual effect resembling a natural fountain waterfall.

☽ Multi-function: Our backflow incense burner is versatile and can be used with both incense cones and incense sticks. When the incense cones burn completely, they create a magical waterfall of smoke, releasing fragrance that create a mysterious and pleasant atmosphere.

☽ Package included: Our insence-stick holder set includes a moon-shaped incense burner, 60 backflow cones and 30 incense sticks, a metal tweezers, and a mat. These complete accessories ensure convenient use of the incense burner.

☽ Application: The waterfall incense burner is suitable for various settings such as homes, bedrooms, living rooms, studies, kitchens, offices, yoga rooms, meditation rooms, and Zen rooms. It also serves as an ideal gift and decorative item for occasions like Christmas, Thanksgiving, Easter, and other holidays.

☽ Customer Services: We prioritize providing the best services to our customers. If you encounter any issues with our incense burner, please don't hesitate to contact us, and we will promptly assist you. We are committed to replacing or refunding any defective products.
body.description: Product Information Size: Diameter 5.11 inches, height 5.9 inches, weight 1 pounds. Materials and Process: 100% hand-made by skilled craftsmen and then calcined the ceramic at high temperatures above 1000°C. How to use? Choose windless place, make sure that there is no breeze blowing through the burner. Tips: Keep away from windows, fans and air conditioners.Ignite the top of the incense cone for about 3-4 mm, and observe whether there is smoke flowing out of the bottom hole.Align the hole at the bottom of the incense cone with the hole at the top of the incense holder to achieve the best smoke effect.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: GARMOLY Moon Incense Burner with Waterfall of Smoke Visual Effect Incense Burner for Multiple Occasions When you stay on home, yoga room, meditation room and Zen room, you can ignite the incense cones, to create relaxed and peaceful atmosphere, enjoy the rest time.

Details description Waterfall Ignite Incense cones will create beautiful waterfall of smoke. Moon On the back is a moon hanging above the sea of clouds. Material Make of high quality ceramic, easy to clean and durable.

Product Information Size: Diameter 5.11 inches, height 5.9 inches, weight 1 pounds. Materials and Process: 100% hand-made by skilled craftsmen and then calcined the ceramic at high temperatures above 1000°C. How to use? Choose windless place, make sure that there is no breeze blowing through the burner. Tips: Keep away from windows, fans and air conditioners.Ignite the top of the incense cone for about 3-4 mm, and observe whether there is smoke flowing out of the bottom hole.Align the hole at the bottom of the incense cone with the hole at the top of the incense holder to achieve the best smoke effect. Attached accessories 60 pcs incense cones, three kinds of scent. 30 pcs incense sticks 1 pcs metal tweezers. (Used to remove burnt incense cones) 1 pcs mat.
Special Gift for her or him The moon incense burner holder is not only a great decoration for home decor, but also a special holiday gift for friend or family, let’s have a gift for her or him!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A lovely piece for my living room.
reviews.reviewText: The Moon Incense Burner is a beautifully crafted piece that adds a touch of tranquility and mystique to any room. Its design, featuring elegant moon motifs, truly stands out and creates a serene ambiance. The way the smoke gently cascades down like a slow-moving waterfall is mesmerizing, transforming the act of burning incense into a visually soothing experience.One of the highlights of this burner is its versatility. It's not just a functional item but also serves as a stunning piece of decor. Whether you're using it during meditation, yoga, or simply as a means to unwind after a long day, it sets the perfect mood and contributes to a calming environment.However, it's important to note that the backflow hole tends to get clogged with regular use. To maintain the smooth flow of smoke, it's advisable to keep a pin or toothpick handy to clear out any blockages. Regular cleaning is essential to keep the burner functioning properly and to ensure the best experience.Despite this minor maintenance requirement, the Moon Incense Burner is a wonderful addition to any space. It makes for an excellent gift for those who appreciate a touch of elegance and zen in their surroundings. Overall, if you're looking for an incense burner that combines functionality with exquisite design, this is a great choice

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Flows perfectly and scent is just right. Great buy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It really does make a smoke waterfall. Really cool. The incense burns right under the top of the moon which leaves a nasty residue, so the design could be a little better, but overall I really like it. Plus its a good deal as it comes with a bunch of incense cones and sticks and tweezers. It also comes with a cheesy pad to set it on which I threw away.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love it, not the cones that came with it.
reviews.reviewText: I love it. It's peaceful and beautiful. It's nice and thick, and feels like it's going to last a long time. I don't like the scent of the cones that came with it, but that's fine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The incense them selves do not smell the best but I have a shop near home that we get all ours from so I just replaced those. Still worth the money!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I got this as a gift for a friend and she loved it. The cones that come with the incense do have a small smell to it. I would recommend to not have the fan going or the smoke won't go on the incense correctly. Also, to not be in front of the cone because the smoke couldn't be going towards you, or you will be coughing a storm.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very attractive and works well. incense that came with it doesn't have much scent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this as a gift for my best friend. I have been seeing them all over social media for months but was unsure if they really worked the way that it showed. It most definitely did. She loves it and says watching the smoke waterfall is mesmerizing. The color is fantastic. I highly recommend this gift.
